compatibility.notes: TORQUE-1.1 is a permissive license, allowing for broad compatibility with other permissive licenses. However, it is incompatible with copyleft licenses like GPL.

key_requirements: Redistributions must retain the copyright notice and acknowledgment.
Redistributions in binary form must include the license and disclaimer in documentation.
Source code must be available for no more than the cost of distribution plus a nominal fee.
license.name: TORQUE-1.1
obligations: Retain copyright notice and acknowledgment in redistributions of source code.
Reproduce copyright notice and acknowledgment in redistributions of binary form.
Provide information on how to obtain complete source code for TORQUE and any modifications.
Include acknowledgment in advertising materials mentioning features or use of the Software.
